availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, tailor. Ohio native. Son of Charles Young and Nancy Dorsey Young. Married to Sarah A. Payne Young. Father of Ada Young, George Young, and Leona Young. Tailor in Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, in 1859. Tailor in Covington in June 1860. Tailor in San Joaquin County, California, in August 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, p. 628.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, California, San Joaquin County, Stockton, p. 1046.
Register of Deaths (1908-1914), California State Archives, Sacramento, CA, Butte County, Film 1673763.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994043, Kenton County Births.
KYR-0001-029-0166
